title: Attributed Model Conversions
description: Attributed Model Conversions is the Raw Conversion Count and Sum of Conversions

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the time-series event.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The time when an event or observation occurred.

eventType.title: Event Type
eventType.description: The primary event type for this time-series record.

searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name

campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
campaignId.description: Campaign Identifer on the advertising platform

placementId.title: Placement Identifier
placementId.description: Placement ID on the dsp advertising platform

adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform

adId.title: Ad Identifier
adId.description: Ad ID on the advertising platform

term.title: Search Term
term.description: Search Term that contributed to the conversion

termId.title: Search Term Identifier
termId.description: Search Term ID on the search advertising platform

matchType.title: Term Match Type
matchType.description: Match Type associated to the Search Term being targeted for the Ad

propertyName.title: Property Name
propertyName.description: Property Name Configured by Pixel, Analytics, Custom Feeds

modelName.title: Model Name
modelName.description: Model that was executed to generate Raw Conversion Count and Sum for the attributed conversion

clickThroughCount.title: Click Through Conversion Count
clickThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is Click

clickThroughValue.title: Click Through Conversion Sum
clickThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is Click

viewThroughCount.title: View Through Conversion Count
viewThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is Impression

viewThroughValue.title: View Through Conversion Sum
viewThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is Impression

clickPlusViewThroughCount.title: Click Plus View Through Conversion Count
clickPlusViewThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

clickPlusViewThroughValue.title: Click Plus View Through Conversion Sum
clickPlusViewThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

viewPlusClickThroughCount.title: View Plus Click Through Conversion Count
viewPlusClickThroughCount.description: Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is impression but clicks present in path

viewPlusClickThroughValue.title: View Plus Click Through Conversion Sum
viewPlusClickThroughValue.description: Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is impression but clicks present in path

conversionType.title: Conversion Type
conversionType.description: Feed Conversion Type the conversion event originated from

device.title: Device
device.description: The device conversion event originated from
